problem.markdown:
>>Define “Operation Time”?<<
( ) the amount that is made in a given time (x) the time that a machine takes to do an operation ( ) the time it takes before delivery ( ) how often a factory delivers on time
[Explanation] Please review Video 5. [Explanation]

choicegroup.choice: the amount that is made in a given time
the time that a machine takes to do an operation
the time it takes before delivery
